headline: Jim Cramer Says the Sell-Off After Almost Every American Express Quarter Is “Usually a Perfect Buying Opportunity”
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the stocks in focus as Jim Cramer shared his weekly game plan. Cramer highlighted the pattern that usually happens after the company reports its earnings, as he stated: Friday can’t come fast enough. Alright, what do we got here? We got American Express. headline: Is It Time To Reconsider American Express (AXP) After Its Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether American Express at around US$363 per share still makes sense for your portfolio, you are not alone. Many investors are asking whether the current price lines up with the underlying value of the business. The stock has eased back recently, with a 0.4% decline over the last 7 days, a 4.7% decline over 30 days and a 2.5% decline year to date, even though the 1 year return stands at 16% and the 3 year and 5 year returns are 118.1% and 229.7% respectively. Recent...
